narrative:
No non-compliance identified at the time of this inspection.
This applicant has met all requirements to receive a class "C" exhibitor license. 
This 1st prelicense inspection for a class "C" license and exit briefing were conducted by the ACI, with the facility
owner.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
All fees must be paid before your license will be issued.  Mail fees to: APHIS, USDA, Animal Care
                                                                                                     920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200
                                                                                                     Raleigh, NC 27606
